resources.string: If you don\'t see any farmers in your herd/visit view it means no farmer has been added yet.\n You can add a new farmer using the Add farmer button in the Add a New Herd page.\n You can use existing farmers by selecting Use Existing Farmer in the Add herd page.
To add a new herd click on the Add a New Herd on the main page.\n Before you can add a new herd you\'ll need to specify a herd size and assign a new or existing farmer to the herd.

To add a visit to a herd tap on herd/visits on the bottom bar.
 The page will show a list of all farmers, tap on the farmer's name to see herds belonging to the farmer.
 Click on add visit to add a new visit for the herd. 
 
 At the top of the visit page you will see a tab with three sections : Health Event, Productivity Event and Dynamic Event.
